statements: SELECT * FROM roles
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM roles
SELECT role_description, role_name FROM roles
SELECT role_id, role_name, role_description FROM roles
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'Admin%';
SELECT role_name, UPPER(role_description) AS description FROM roles WHERE role_id > 2 ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name IN ('Admin', 'Moderator', 'User') ORDER BY role_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE role='Manager';
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE role='Admin' OR role='Manager';
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE employee_id=101;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE role='Manager'
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE role='Staff' ORDER BY employee_id DESC
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees ORDER BY role ASC, employee_name ASC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, role FROM employees JOIN access_logs ON employees.employee_id = access_logs.employee_id WHERE access_type='Login'
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE role='Manager' OR role='Admin' ORDER BY employee_name
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT name, role FROM employees
SELECT id, role, name FROM employees ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM roles
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id ASC
SELECT id, name, role FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'Admin%';
SELECT employees.name, roles.role_name FROM employees INNER JOIN roles ON employees.role = roles.role_name;
SELECT employees.name, roles.role_name FROM employees JOIN roles ON employees.role = roles.role_name ORDER BY employees.name ASC;
SELECT employees.name, roles.role_name FROM employees JOIN roles ON employees.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE employees.id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM access_control WHERE role_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, role_id FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1,3,5);
SELECT role_id, permission_id FROM role_permissions WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY permission_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, role_id FROM employees WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, role_name FROM employees INNER JOIN roles ON employees.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT employee_name, permission_name FROM employees INNER JOIN roles ON employees.role_id = roles.role_id INNER JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id INNER JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;

SELECT employee_name, role_name, permission_name FROM employees INNER JOIN roles ON employees.role_id = roles.role_id INNER JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id INNER JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE employee_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, resources.resource_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN resources ON roles.role_id = resources.resource_id;

SELECT users.username, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id
SELECT resource_name FROM resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id
